AT.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
AT.description: In The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D besteht deine Aufgabe darin, innerhalb eines Zeitlimits ein dem Untergang geweihtes Land zu retten. In der vollständig überarbeiteten Neuauflage des beliebten Nintendo 64-Klassikers, begibst du dich auf eine aufregende Mission in einer geheimnisvollen Welt. Die Grafik wurde komplett überarbeitet und neue Funktionen hinzugefügt, dem Original bleibt das Spiel aber jederzeit treu. Schon in drei Tagen wird der Mond herabstürzen und das gesamte Land zerstören. Mithilfe der magischen Okarina der Zeit muss Link durch die Zeit reisen und dieselben drei Tage wieder und wieder durchleben, um die Katastrophe zu verhindern und die Welt zu retten. Du erkundest jeden Winkel von Termina und begibst dich in Furcht einflößende Verliese, tückische Gebirgszüge, verseuchte Sümpfe, karge Steppenlandschaft oder in einen riesigen Ozean, um schließlich das Horror Kid aufzuhalten.

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Die Zeit ist gekommen!
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Trailer (06.11.2014)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Trailer (14.01.2015)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Special Edition

AU.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
AU.description: Race against time and save a doomed land in The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. In this full remaster of the fan favourite Nintendo 64 title, which includes refreshed visuals and features while remaining true to the original title, embark on an engrossing, spooky quest through a mysterious world. Join Link as he seeks to save the land of Termina from a crushing fate – in three days, the moon will crash down and destroy everything and everyone in its path. By using the magical Ocarina of Time, Link must travel through time, re-living the same three days over and over again, to prevent calamity and save the world. Explore every corner of Termina and delve into dangerous dungeons, across treacherous mountains, poisonous swamps, an eerie desert and a vast ocean, on your mission to stop Skull Kid!

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Trailer (06/11/2014)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Special Edition

BG.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
BG.description: Race against time and save a doomed land in The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. In this full remaster of the fan favourite Nintendo 64 title, which includes refreshed visuals and features while remaining true to the original title, embark on an engrossing, spooky quest through a mysterious world. Join Link as he seeks to save the land of Termina from a crushing fate – in three days, the moon will crash down and destroy everything and everyone in its path. By using the magical Ocarina of Time, Link must travel through time, re-living the same three days over and over again, to prevent calamity and save the world. Explore every corner of Termina and delve into dangerous dungeons, across treacherous mountains, poisonous swamps, an eerie desert and a vast ocean, on your mission to stop Skull Kid!

BE.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
BE.description: Sauver la terre maudite de Termina dans une course effrénée contre la montre dans The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D. Embarquez pour une mission fascinante dans cette version remaniée du titre Nintendo 64 populaire, avec des graphismes et des fonctionnalités mises au goût du jour, mais l'esprit du jeu original est quant à lui conservé. Retrouvez Link dans sa quête pour sauver le monde de Termina voué à un terrible destin : dans trois jours, la lune s'écrasera dessus et balayera tout sur son passage. Grâce à l'Ocarina du Temps magique, Link doit voyager dans le temps et revivre les mêmes trois jours encore et encore pour éviter le cataclysme. Explorez tous les coins de Termina pour arrêter Skull Kid : vous allez parcourir de dangereux donjons, des montagnes périlleuses, des marécages empoisonnés, un désert effrayant et un vaste océan !

The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - bande-annonce (06/11/2014)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask : bande-annonce (14/01/2015)

Explore every corner of Termina and delve into dangerous dungeons, across treacherous mountains, poisonous swamps, an eerie desert and a vast ocean, on your mission to stop Skull Kid!

ES.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
ES.description: Salva la tierra de Términa en una desesperada carrera contra el reloj en Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D. Embárcate en una fascinante misión en esta renovada versión del popular título de Nintendo 64, con nuevos gráficos y funciones, pero fiel al espíritu del juego original. Únete a Link en su afán por evitar que el mundo de Términa se vea abocado a un infausto desenlace: en tres días, la luna se estrellará contra él y arrasará con todo lo que encuentre a su paso. Ayudándose de la mágica Ocarina del Tiempo, Link debe viajar en el tiempo y revivir los mismos tres días una y otra vez para impedir el cataclismo. Explora todos los rincones de Términa y adéntrate en peligrosas mazmorras, cruza traicioneras montañas, pantanos ponzoñosos, un fantasmal desierto y un vasto océano. ¡Todo para poder derrotar a Skull Kid!

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: La hora ha llegado

Explore every corner of Termina and delve into dangerous dungeons, across treacherous mountains, poisonous swamps, an eerie desert and a vast ocean, on your mission to stop Skull Kid!

IT.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
IT.description: Corri contro il tempo e salva una terra in pericolo in The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. In questo remake integrale del popolare titolo per Nintendo 64, con grafica e caratteristiche rinnovate ma fedeli al titolo originale, ti imbarcherai in un'avvincente e spaventosa missione all'interno di un mondo misterioso. Unisciti a Link per salvare la terra di Termina da un destino tremendo: nel giro di tre giorni, la luna precipiterà, distruggendo tutto e tutti sulla sua traiettoria. Usando la magica ocarina del tempo, Link deve viaggiare nel tempo e continuare a rivivere gli stessi tre giorni per evitare la tragedia e salvare il mondo. Esplora ogni angolo di Termina, addentrandoti in pericolosi dungeon, superando montagne insidiose e paludi avvelenate, percorrendo un deserto soprannaturale e un oceano immenso, per fermare Skull Kid!

NL.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
NL.description: Race tegen de klok en red een vervloekt land van de ondergang in The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. In deze remake van de game voor de Nintendo 64 vind je verbeterde graphics en functies, terwijl het gevoel van de oorspronkelijke game bewaard blijft. Beleef een meeslepend en angstaanjagend avontuur in een geheimzinnige wereld. Ga samen met Link op pad om het land Termina te behoeden voor een gruwelijk lot. Binnen drie dagen stort de maan op de aarde, waardoor alles en iedereen zal worden verwoest. Met de magische Ocarina of Time moet Link door de tijd reizen en dezelfde drie dagen steeds opnieuw beleven om een ramp te voorkomen en de wereld te redden. Verken iedere uithoek van Termina, waaronder gevaarlijke kerkers, verraderlijke bergen, giftige moerassen, een spookachtige woestijn en een uitgestrekte oceaan, om de plannen van de Skull Kid te dwarsbomen.

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Het aftellen is begonnen

The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Trailer (06/11/2014)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Trailer (14/01/2015)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Special Edition

PT.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
PT.description: Corre contra o tempo para tentares salvar Termina em The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. Nesta reedição do clássico para a Nintendo 64, que inclui gráficos reformulados ao mesmo tempo que se mantém fiel ao original, embarcas numa sinistra missão por um misterioso mundo. Em apenas três dias, a Lua descerá e destruirá totalmente a terra de Termina. Perante a perspetiva deste cruel destino, Link embarca na missão de a salvar, viajando no tempo e usando a mágica Ocarina of Time à medida que revive os mesmos três dias vezes incontáveis para impedir uma calamidade e salvar o mundo. Explora todos os cantos e recantos de Termina e atravessa perigosas masmorras, montanhas, pântanos venenosos, um deserto e até um oceano, na tua missão para deteres o Skull Kid.

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Chegou a hora
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Trailer (06/11/2014)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Trailer (14/01/2015)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Special Edition

RU.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Опередите время и спасите обреченную страну в игре The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D, которая выйдет исключительно на системах линейки Nintendo 3DS. Это полностью переработанное издание любимой многими игры для консоли Nintendo 64, которое может похвастать обновленной графикой и новыми функциями, но при этом остается верной духу оригинальной игры. Помогите Линку спасти гибнущий мир: ведь через три дня луна рухнет на Термину и уничтожит все на своем пути. Волшебная Окарина времени послушно откроет перед вами врата времени, и вы раз за разом будете проживать эти три дня, пока не найдете способ предотвратить катастрофу и спасти мир. Исследуйте каждый уголок Термины, спускайтесь в опасные подземелья, взбирайтесь на коварные горные пики, преодолевайте отравленные топи и безжизненные пустыни, чтобы остановить Скал Кида!

movies.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: Время пришло

The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: трейлер (14.01.2015)
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Special Edition

SE.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D
SE.description: Race against time and save a doomed land in The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask 3D. In this full remaster of the fan favourite Nintendo 64 title, which includes refreshed visuals and features while remaining true to the original title, embark on an engrossing, spooky quest through a mysterious world. Join Link as he seeks to save the land of Termina from a crushing fate – in three days, the moon will crash down and destroy everything and everyone in its path. By using the magical Ocarina of Time, Link must travel through time, re-living the same three days over and over again, to prevent calamity and save the world. Explore every corner of Termina and delve into dangerous dungeons, across treacherous mountains, poisonous swamps, an eerie desert and a vast ocean, on your mission to stop Skull Kid!
